channel.title: Idea for a new bot
channel.description:
First off, let me tell you that I'm not particularly knowledgable in JAVA fundamentals and might be completely wrong. If that's true then I'm sorry to waste space with this thread.
Anyways, here's my idea. For the bot I'm looking for it would only require simple client-editing and color recognition. Here's the idea. You load a modified version of the RuneScape client. Then look for the items you're going to use in the script. Then, you mark every item that you're going to use somehow. Sort of like giving every item you are going to use an ID or something along those lines. Then you only have to tell the script (atItem(234,1)) sort of like aryan. The bot looks for the item you marked, (let's say rocks.) When it finds it, it clicks on it for you. Some of the more simple functions could be used by color-recogniton, or simply by putting in the x and y coords of the location you want it to click, allowing parts of the bot to maybe even ripped from the functions of SCAR. You could also use multiple accounts using IMPsoft's UBI.
Please post on whether or not you think this would work, and if you do and decide to make it, I will help in any way i can.

item.title: Idea for a new bot
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

i always had an idea of making the bot make a certain sprite one colour on startup, but was too lazy to figure it out. another idea was drawing a dot or box w/e for scar to find on the game screen…again, too lazy.

Read full topic
